Sentencas: Fuel cells belong to an avant-garde technology family for a wide variety of applications including micro-power, transportation power, stationary power for buildings and other distributed generation applications.
Titulo: Model Reduction of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for Control Purposes

Sentencas: The first objective of this contribution is to find a suitable reduced model of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC).
Titulo: Model Reduction of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for Control Purposes

Sentencas: The derived reduced model is then used to design a state estimator.
Titulo: Model Reduction of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for Control Purposes

Sentencas: In the first step, the distributed model of the SOFC that is derived using the first principle balance equations is solved by the method of lines.
Titulo: Model Reduction of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for Control Purposes

Sentencas: Since this model is too complex and sluggish for real-time applications, a representation of this model with lower number of states and good accuracy is needed.
Titulo: Model Reduction of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for Control Purposes

Sentencas: Karhunen-Loeve-Galerkin (KLG) procedure is used to develop such a reduced model.
Titulo: Model Reduction of a Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) for Control Purposes
